org.team751.cheesy.util

Class ContinuousAccelFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team751.cheesy.util.AccelFilterBase
      • org.team751.cheesy.util.ContinuousAccelFilter

  • public class ContinuousAccelFilter
extends AccelFilterBase
    A continuous time acceleration profile. An instance of continuous data is assumed to have a constant rate of change over a period of time. Thus, over any given time increment, acceleration is assumed to be constant. Thus data for this filter does not need to be polled necessarily periodically.

    • Field Summary
